item.title: Leveraging Hallucinations to Reduce Manual Prompt Dependency in Promptable Segmentation
item.description: ProMaC leverages MLLM hallucinations in an iterative framework to generate precise prompts for accurate object segmentation, minimizing manual prompt dependency.
